content: Fix test data setup to create 5 active students, 1 group, and 2 inactive students
Add methods to TestUser for creating groups and inactive students
Recreate baseline screenshots with correct test data
Phase 4: CI/CD Optimization & Performance - Ready to start
Week 7: Test Performance Optimization (parallel execution, data optimization, mock improvements)
Week 7: Test Reliability Enhancement (retry mechanisms, test isolation, cleanup)
Week 7: Cross-Browser Testing (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, mobile browsers)
Week 8: CI/CD Pipeline Enhancement (GitHub Actions optimization, test reporting)
Week 8: Monitoring & Reporting (test metrics dashboard, coverage reporting)
Week 8: Documentation & Training (guidelines, troubleshooting, best practices)
